title: [Large-scale] Learning Analytics Dashboard Design: Educational Data Visualization Through Human-Centered Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with basic data analysis concepts and experience using simple digital tools
context.additional_context: Students design dashboards using social studies learning data and perform project-based activities reflecting real educational field demands

learning_goals: Learners can classify learning activity data and design appropriate dashboard layouts based on visualization types.
Learners can develop dashboard functionalities that analyze teacher-student interaction data to propose educational intervention strategies.
Learners can create flexible dashboard prototypes applicable to diverse learning contexts (class types/sizes).

resources: Google Data Studio or Power BI Educational Accounts

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
